channel.title: [Prim] Monitor [ Prim]
channel.description:
Well, I was f*cking bored and I decided to model a monitor, as I didn't want Dylan to ripp the model off, I did it with primitives :P
Overall View : [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/vsfcdt.png[/img] Back View : [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/iyfplu.png[/img] Side View : [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2ni5hdi.png[/img]
Rate it 1 to 10 Please, I'd appreciate it.
Thanks for the view,
- Assassins Creed Fan.
Ps: The PolyCount is : 625.

item.title: [Prim] Monitor [ Prim]
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch2 Java Is My Bitch
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch2 wrote:

[quote=“dylan_0789, post:17, topic:316639”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=413195.msg3043994#msg3043994 date=1259346508]

Kracky switch programs… Try wings3d and blender, start off with wings3d then move on to blender. There VERY good for primitives (Especially wings3d.)
[/quote].

I would just let people switch if they want to switch. I personally like the easy-ish style of meta. So i wont be changing any time soon. But yea, just let people change when they want, no need to tell em to.

blenders easier to use than meta imo… once you figure it out that is. some of the models posted here through meta taking ‘3 hours’ i could do in 15-30 mins. but thats cuz i memorized the important hotkeys[/quote]EXACTLY! Omg… People need to move on.

Read full topic
